beneficiaries.title: Beneficiary Review

commandRoster.description: Your executors and trusted people are the foundation of your family's protection plan.

complete.description: Your annual review has been completed successfully.
complete.message: Your annual review has been completed. Your family's protection plan is now current and effective.
complete.noChanges: No changes were needed. Your plan is current.
complete.reminder: We'll remind you when it's time for your next annual review.
complete.title: Review Complete

annualReview.description: Life changes quickly. This annual review ensures your legacy plan stays aligned with your current situation and wishes.

step1.description: Confirm your trusted people are still the right choices for your family
step1.title: Review Your Executors

step2.description: Verify your asset inventory is current and complete
step2.title: Review Your Assets

step3.description: Ensure your beneficiaries are still the right people
step3.title: Review Your Beneficiaries

step4.description: Finalize your annual review and update your plan

annualReview.subtitle: Keep your family's protection plan current and effective

confidence.description: As you complete each step, you'll feel more confident and in control. What once seemed impossible becomes achievable.
confidence.title: Builds Confidence

family.description: Every completed step directly protects your family. From emergency access to long-term planning, each action matters.
family.title: Family Protection

overwhelm.description: Instead of facing a massive to-do list, you tackle one small task at a time. Each step is designed to be completed in under 5 minutes.
overwhelm.title: Eliminates Overwhelm

progress.description: See your family's preparedness grow with each completed step. Track your progress and celebrate small wins along the way.
progress.title: Visible Progress

complexityReduction.description: We understand that planning for the future can feel overwhelming. Our complexity reduction system breaks down every task into simple, actionable steps that take just minutes to complete.

difficultyLevels.description: Simple, Easy, Medium, and Complex ratings help you choose what to tackle first.
difficultyLevels.title: Clear Difficulty Levels

helpAvailable.description: Get assistance, explanations, and support for any step that feels challenging.
helpAvailable.title: Help When You Need It

progressTracking.description: See your family's preparedness grow with each completed step.
progressTracking.title: Progress Tracking

stepByStep.description: Each task is broken down into clear, simple instructions that anyone can follow.
stepByStep.title: Step-by-Step Guidance

timeEstimation.description: Know exactly how long each step will take, from 2 minutes to 15 minutes maximum.
timeEstimation.title: Accurate Time Estimates

insurancePolicies.title: Document Insurance Policies

insurancePolicies.why: Why this matters: Ensures claims can be filed quickly and correctly

legalDocuments.title: Organize Legal Documents

legalDocuments.why: Why this matters: Ensures legal wishes are followed and processes are smooth

contacts.description: Njerëz kyç që ky kujdestar duhet të kontaktojë ose të njoftojë.
contacts.title: Kontaktet e Rëndësishme

digital.description: Udhëzime për trajtimin e pranisë suaj dixhitale dhe llogarive online.
digital.placeholder:
Listoni llogaritë tuaja dixhitale dhe si duhet të trajtohen...

Për shembull:
- Llogaritë e mediave sociale (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn)
- Llogaritë e emailit
- Ruajtja në cloud (Google Drive, Dropbox)
- Shërbimet e abonimit (Netflix, Spotify)
- Llogaritë bankare dhe financiare online
- Portofolet e kriptomonedhave
- Uebfaqet ose emrat e domain-eve
digital.title: Mbyllja e Llogarive Dixhitale

documents.description: Ku të gjeni dokumente të rëndësishme fizike dhe dixhitale.
documents.placeholder:
Përshkruani ku ndodhen dokumentet e rëndësishme...

Për shembull:
- Vendndodhja e testamentit
- Polisat e sigurimit
- Aktet e pronësisë
- Informacioni i llogarisë bankare
- Dokumentet e investimeve
- Deklaratat tatimore
- Fjalëkalimet dhe kodet e aksesit
- Vendndodhja dhe çelësi i kutisë së sigurisë
documents.title: Vendndodhjet e Dokumenteve

funeral.description: Preferencat tuaja për rregullimet e varrimit dhe shërbimet përkujtimore.
funeral.placeholder:
Përshkruani dëshirat tuaja për varrimin ose shërbimin përkujtimor...

Për shembull:
- Lloji i shërbimit (fetar, laik, festim i jetës)
- Preferencat për varrim ose kremim
- Preferencat e vendndodhjes
- Muzika, leximet, ose kërkesa të veçanta
- Kush duhet të flasë ose të marrë pjesë
- Çdo traditë specifike që duhet ndjekur
funeral.title: Dëshirat për Varrim

messages.description: Mesazhe personale dhe mendime të fundit për këtë kujdestar.
messages.placeholder:
Shkruani një mesazh personal për këtë kujdestar...

Kjo është mundësia juaj për të:
- Shprehur ndjenjat dhe mirënjohjen tuaj
- Ndarë kujtime të rëndësishme
- Dhënë udhëzime ose këshilla
- Shpjeguar vendimet tuaja
- Lënë fjalë ngushëllimi
- Ndarë shpresat tuaja për të ardhmen
messages.title: Mesazhe Personale

practical.description: Hapat e menjëhershëm praktikë dhe përgjegjësitë për këtë kujdestar.
practical.placeholder:
Listoni detyrat praktike dhe veprimet e menjëhershme...

Për shembull:
- Lista e kontrollit për 24-48 orët e para
- Kë të njoftoni së pari
- Fatura ose pagesa urgjente
- Udhëzime për kujdesin (kafshë shtëpiake, bimë, pronë)
- Çështje biznesi që kërkojnë vëmendje
- Takime të planifikuara për t'u anuluar
- Çelësa dhe kode aksesi të nevojshme
practical.title: Udhëzime Praktike

subtitle.edit: Krijoni udhëzime dhe informacione të personalizuara për këtë kujdestar.
subtitle.view: Informacion dhe udhëzime thelbësore të përgatitura për ju.

playbook.viewDescription: Informacion dhe udhëzime thelbësore të përgatitura posaçërisht për ju
playbook.viewFooter: Ky informacion ju është besuar si kujdestar. Ju lutemi mbajeni konfidencial dhe të sigurt.

descriptions.activatePowerOfAttorney: Ensure designated person can make decisions.
descriptions.arrangeBillPayments: Set up automatic payments or delegate to trusted person.
descriptions.billsGoUnpaid: Your family can't access your primary checking account to pay the mortgage.
descriptions.businessDecisionsStall: Clients and employees don't know who is authorized to make decisions.
descriptions.businessNoLeadership: Your business can continue operating smoothly with clear leadership and decision-making processes.
descriptions.contactExecutor: Reach out to John Smith to start will proceedings.
descriptions.executorBeginsProbate: The executor will file for probate to manage the estate.
descriptions.familyCannotAccessBankAccount: Your family can now pay bills and manage daily expenses without delay or legal complications.
descriptions.familyCannotManageFinances: Your spouse can now legally manage all financial matters, ensuring bills are paid and investments are protected.
descriptions.fileDisabilityBenefits: Submit necessary paperwork for insurance claims.
descriptions.insuranceDetailsUnknown: Life insurance policy details and beneficiaries are unknown.
descriptions.locateWill: Locate and secure the will at the designated location.
descriptions.noWillFound: The family cannot locate or confirm the existence of a will.
descriptions.notifyImmediateFamily: Ensure all immediate family members are informed.
descriptions.securePhysicalProperty: Ensure that the home and vehicles are secure.

hospitalized.description: An unexpected health issue means you're unable to manage daily affairs. Your family needs to step in.
hospitalized.title: What if you're in the hospital for 3 months?

incapacitated.description: A serious accident leaves you unable to make decisions for yourself. Who will make them for you?
incapacitated.title: What if you become incapacitated?

suddenPassing.description: The ultimate test of your preparation. Is your family ready to navigate this difficult time without chaos?
suddenPassing.title: What if something happens to you tomorrow?

scenarioPlanner.these_are_estimates_of_the_pos_10: These are estimates of the potential costs if vulnerabilities are not addressed

vulnerabilities.businessNoLeadership: Business operations have no clear leadership
vulnerabilities.familyCannotAccessBankAccount: Family cannot access primary bank account
vulnerabilities.familyCannotManageFinances: Family cannot legally manage your finances

scenarioPlanner.without_proper_preparation_you_7: Without proper preparation, you and your family could face these challenges

bottomCta.primary: Don't Let Your Family Face This Chaos
bottomCta.urgency: Every day you wait is another day your family is unprepared

after.benefit: Everything accessible right when she needed it.
after.situation: When Emma's husband was traveling and she needed emergency funds for their son's surgery, she had immediate access to all account information, insurance details, and even pre-written authorization letters. No delays, no stress.

before.situation: When David's flight was delayed and he missed his daughter's emergency surgery, his wife couldn't access their savings account or find their medical insurance information. Critical decisions had to wait.

after.benefit: Immediate access to everything she needed.
after.situation: When Mark had his accident, his wife Lisa opened their family guide and found everything organized: insurance details, bank contacts, medical information, and even a list of people to notify. She could focus on what mattered most - being there for Mark.

before.consequence: Days of searching for information and support.
before.situation: Sarah's husband had a heart attack. While he was in intensive care, she spent days trying to find their insurance papers, bank account information, and important contacts. The stress was overwhelming when she needed to focus on his recovery.

scenarios.subtitle: Real families, real situations, real control and preparedness

after.benefit: A clear path to follow in difficult times.
after.situation: When John's family needed to handle his affairs, everything was clearly organized: a complete list of accounts, important contacts, step-by-step instructions, and even personal messages he'd prepared for each family member.

before.situation: After losing her father suddenly, Maria spent months trying to piece together his financial affairs. She found accounts she didn't know existed and missed important deadlines because documents were scattered everywhere.

scenarios.title: What Happens When Life Takes an Unexpected Turn?
